December 11* 1950
Mr. W. 1* Griffith
W0I, Iowe State College
Ames, Iowa
Dear Mr. Griffithi
I am transmitting herewith the expense account for Mr.
Graydon Ausrnus, totalling #125*80, and the expense account
for Mr* Sam Gould, totalling #67.46. I am sorry that these
have not been made out on regular voucher forms, and I hope
that the letter claims will be a satisfactory basis for your
mailing checks to both of these gentlemen without delay*
I am also enclosing a bill from the Public Service Letter
k Printing Co. for #11*01, as well as their statement for #493*88.
This latter amount was forwarded to you for payment last week.
I appreciate the speed and efficiency with which you handled
the incoming checks. I realise that this is a severe drain on your
time, and I am hoping that seme concrete method of acknowledging
this added service will be approved at the next Board of Directors
meeting.
I wonder whether it would be possible to receive a monthly
report from you on our financial status* This need only include
the financial transactions during the month, and a final figure
of our balance.
Such financial statements would be of inestimable help to
the Directors when they meet again, either in January or February.
With all best wishes, I am
As ever.
Seymour W. Siegel
President, UAEB
SHStas
Enclosures
